title: Angular Library Options Schema
description: Generates a new Angular Library in the workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

directory.description: The directory where to create the library.

entryFile.description: The path at which to create the library's public API file, relative to the workspace root.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipTsConfig.description: When true, does not update "tsconfig.json" to add a path mapping for the new library. The path mapping is needed to use the library in an app, but can be disabled here to simplify development.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests

sandboxApp.description: When true, creates a sandbox application.
sandboxApp.x-prompt: Would you like to add a sandbox application?
